reviews.review: Место где погибают нервные клетки, рассадник злых детей и необъятное пространство для софтеров с кривыми руками. Слово" развитие "во всех его пониманиях умерло или еще не зарождалось.

Herkesin bildiği gibi csgo yılların oyunu olmakta ve olmaya devam etmekte. Tek başına oynadığınız zaman oyun gayet eğlenceli fakat arkadaşlarınızla beraber oyuna giriyor olmak eğlenceyi arttırıyor. Oyun içerisinde takımı küçük düşüren ya da hem rakip takım hem de kendi takımınızda hile geliyor olsa da netice oyun güzel. Tavsiye ederim
Excelente jogo, porém poderia ser mais intuitivo a usabilidade do mercado em geral.
Есть пару отрицательных моментов, о которых многие знают, а так, зайти иногда, пострелять, можно
Played the game a bit. Kinda easy when you know where the bullets go
Oyun çok güzel fakat Hile Koruması halen çok zayıf.
Um classico dos fps porem mal administrado pela Valve
I bought the game a week before it went free-to-play. Pogme amirite?
от меня ушла девушка 5 раз, но теперь у меня парень
очень много читеров в игре, каждая катка это условно говоря читер, в начале они могут играть без них,как только понимают что проигрывают начинают использовать их!

Enquanto estiver de graça vão haver muitos hackers nesse jogo, valve esta uma bosta, não esta banindo nenhum uso de hack, então aproveitem e xitem mesmo, ngm faz nada. 
Enquanto não cobrarem pelo jogo dnv e não tiverem um ant xiter bom, não da pra jogar.
This is buy far one of the worst purchases i have ever made and if i could i would spit on the fucking game.
game is so good but remove the cheaters please
how to increase the trust factor in game?
mto bom odeio essa merda viciante
Execelente juego se puede pasar un muy buen rato!

bom jogo, bonito até.
mas tem muitos cheaters, até com alta integridade!
LA VERDAD QUE ME ENCANTA AUTO CHUPARME LA PIJA
is game of fun and hacks (sometimes)
this game is best game of all game
be gold nova or you cant report hackers
This used to be a great game but since ftp it's went to the ground due to hackers and shit I unfortunately can't recommend this game
fun game. some sweats. overall game to hop onto,

Been playing this game for over 20 years now - since it's beta 5.2 days.

Still enjoy playing it. Nostalgia kicks in while playing with my friends and new system/challenges makes the game more interesting.
Takes a while to get into but after 200 hours I can say its a game I enjoy.

You’ll enjoy the game a lot until smurfs or hackers show up in the opponents or even sad matchmaking. But no matter what the game will always be the best.
Still waiting for Source 2 :3
